channel.title: Creative-Scape V4 - Oldschool Server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/CkBmohL.gif?1[/img]
[b]Creative-Scape is an oldschool based server with an emphasis on bringing back that nostalgic feeling of playing RuneScape back in 2007.
[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/O8i5SSz.png?1[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Hours of Skilling time[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jJTIViT.png?1[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Variety of different Bosses[/b][/size]
Including:
[b]Chaos Elemental[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lgu1X0o.png?1[/img]
[b]Kalphite Queen[/b] (both forms)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5mpoXLD.png?1[/img]
Pestilence (Custom Boss)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4dhD6ST.png?1[/img]
[size=10pt][b]King Black Dragon[/b][/size] (Melee & Mage)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GjljtEM.png?1[/img]
Ice Queen
[img]http://i.imgur.com/d3VvM5b.png?1[/img]
Barrows Brothers
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DlE8ggz.gif?1[/img]
And many more.
[size=12pt][b]Slayer Tasks [/b][/size] Be assigned Slayer Tasks and complete them to gain Slayer Points
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Z2ffBU6.png?1[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Duelling[/b][/size]
Custom duelling area, with a working Duel Arena System
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zM68qsY.png?1[/img]
[size=12pt][size=10pt][b]Proper Skilling Areas[/b][/size][/size] [b] (Smithing)[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/M66rYnW.png?1[/img]
[b](Woodcutting)[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/V3yY8dH.png?1[/img]
[b](Fishing/Cooking)[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nItQUlZ.png?1[/img]
[b](Farming)[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9I8XH7Z.png?1[/img]
[b](Runecrafting)[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZLFKW2d.gif?1[/img]
[b](Agility)[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/b6GgX7A.gif?1[/img]
And of course, the rest of them!
[size=10pt][b]Fully functioning Pest Control[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5lAePzD.png?1[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Hi-Scores[/b][/size]
Compete against your friends for a spot on the Hi-Scores List
[img]http://i.imgur.com/q5etthr.png?1[/[size=18pt][b]Register Today[/b][/size]
http://play.creative-scape.net/registration
Creative-Scape.net [/center]

item.title: Creative-Scape V4 - Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @z0mbie z0mbie
item.description:
@z0mbie wrote:

Wang Cars:

try making any username and maybe as an Admin i can edit your name for you. i will try my best for you.
=-=-==-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

Brand new Areas have been added into CRS.
New Voting Arena for players who choose to vote and support our server has been added with monster who drop items you will find only in that Arena.

New Premium Member benefits have been added ingame aswell. Premium Dungeon with new monsters that have awesome drops including the long awaited Dragon Pickaxe.

You can read more about these Updates by following this link - http://creative-scape.net/forums/index.php?/topic/17068-december-31st-vote-reward-area-prem-dungeon-bugfixes/&page=1

www.creative-scape.net

Read full topic

Regular updates, weekly events, and ofcourse a ton of stuff to look out for! All of that can you find at Creative-Scape! Join now!

And a happy new year from everyone of us!

item.title: Creative-Scape V4 - Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @Dominoess Dominoess
item.description:
@Dominoess wrote:

The Updates keep on coming

  • Voting announcements have been fixed
    Every vote you make now gets announced over yell
    Every rare from mboxes now gets announced

  • Bob has been added to fix broken axes and in the future, barrows pieces. He can be found at Falador

  • Zahur has been added to decant noted potions into (4) doses. She can be found at ::farm

You can read a full list of these updates & any bug fixes by following this link - http://creative-scape.net/forums/index.php?/topic/16851-december-16th-yell-announcements-new-npcs/

Hope to see more of you in game

Read full topic

item.title: Creative-Scape V4 - Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @dries3s dries3s
item.description:
@dries3s wrote:

December 13th Updates!

Christmas:

The BG of the client has been changed to something more "christmassy"
Winter has come and the world is covered in snow!
Sleds have been added to mboxes, more to come
Several new items have been added to the donation store. These include:
3 different coloured santa hats
2 new colours of boxing gloves

New Items:

Dboots have been added ingame and are now dropped by black dragons and the KBD.
The slayer shop has been added to the slayer master at the Slayer Tower
Currently only contains slayer helmets
4 tiers of helmet. Each gives a 5% hit and accuracy boost per tier against slayer NPCs starting at a 15% boost for the first tier. These do stack with salve effects.
Each tier has better stats than the last
The pest control store now sells helmet sets for 75 points.
Each helmet gives a 10% accuracy and hit boost in their respective styles, provided you have the set (top, legs, gloves).
The other rewards in the store have been removed as they were useless.
The salve(e) has been added to the donation store. It gives a 20% accuracy and hit bonus on all NPCs.
The regular salve effect has been changed to give a 5% hit bonus and 10% accuracy bonus on all NPCs. The old effect (15% hit and accuracy bonus) still works vs slayer npcs. It also now has some stats.
Misc:

The mines teleport is now fully functional. Thanks to Z0mbie for this
Several item’s from the PKP store have been given stats where they were lacking.
Event blocking has been fixed. Now you’ll see hits at the same time as they hit instead of 600ms later in some cases.
Satchels not dropping from mboxes has been fixed
Some bugs with xlogging effecting regular logout has been fixed
The Ring of Freedom is now tradeable
Pest control points are now stored differently so you can have an unlimited number of them instead of a maximum of 128. Your current points should be converted to the new system upon login.
Several unused items have been removed from the donation page. They might be added back in the future with a redesign to the page.

The Adversary code is nearly done, I’m just finishing some attacks and then it’s just implementing the area code (the one that hurts you if you camp the area without killing any minions) and it’s done. You can expect to see it sometime next week with a few other wilderness changes

This update involves a new client, so reload your launchers to get the latest files.

Read full topic

item.title: Creative-Scape V4 - Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @dries3s dries3s
item.description:
@dries3s wrote:

3rd of December Update

Isle/Karambwans

Isle has now become a premium area
It features a bank chest, 3 coal ore, 3 gold, 2 mithril and 1 adamant ore
4 fishing spots have been added for karambwans, several other spots are available
2 fires that will never go out
Karambwans have been added to Isle. Only premium members can catch them but any account can cook them.
They require 90 fishing to catch.
They require 90 cooking to cook.
They can be used to double-eat
They heal 18hp per karambwan
Banana stalls at home now give bananas that can be cut as bait for vessel fishing.
Elves have been added south of home for non premium members.

Ring of Freedom

Back by popular demand, the Eagle Ring or The “Ring of Freedom” has been added to the donation store for $15. It turns you into an eagle when you equip it and operate it.

Read full topic
